attributes.action: Remove the BBC Television licence fee defund the bbc
attributes.additional_details: Defund the BBC, the corporation has lost its objectivity and is no longer representative of main stream Britain it has demonstrated extreme bias toward the left and socialism over the last 2 years and appears to be anti government  I do not feel that people should be forced to financially support such brazenly left wing bias a national broadcaster should be both unbiased and neutral reporting all facts and not just the ones they wish and must at all times be based in fact
attributes.background: Repeal legislation that requires tv owners to pay to fund the BBC services
